author: Christianna Silva
title: State Legislatures Are Working To Ban Abortion Access During The COVID-19 Pandemic
description: Texas and Ohio have included abortions among the nonessential surgeries and medical procedures that are required to be delayed as a result of the novel coronavirus pandemic.
content:
State legislatures are trying to stop people from obtaining abortions in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Some lawmakers in Texas and Ohio two states with notoriously anti-choice legislation are attempting to include abortions among the surgeries and medic… [+4407 chars]
